trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGSAKPRESERVATIONLABOCOMMON_00949_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>The terminal screen displays what appears to be the index page of an employee manual.

TEXT_REGSAKPRESERVATIONLABOCOMMON_00949_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>(-Personnel Protocols-)For security reasons, Containment Complex 10-29 has been registered as a materials distribution center. Keep this in mind and conduct yourself accordingly, both inside and outside the facility.

TEXT_REGSAKPRESERVATIONLABOCOMMON_00949_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>(-Personnel Protocols-)Each employee must perform their tasks within their designated workrooms: the researchers' commons, the protolab, or the deuterolab. Entrance into another workroom without official clearance is strictly prohibited.
TEXT_REGSAKPRESERVATIONLABOCOMMON_00949_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>(-Personnel Protocols-)Carry your security card at all times. Your clearance level dictates the areas to which you have access.

TEXT_REGSAKPRESERVATIONLABOCOMMON_00949_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>(-Personnel Protocols-)Equip your regulator at all times. Due to the highly confidential nature of the research materials and other data managed within this complex, Preservation retains the ownership of─and the rights to modify─the memories of all registered personnel.
TEXT_REGSAKPRESERVATIONLABOCOMMON_00949_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>(-Research Objectives-)Access denied. Please log in with your personnel account to view.
TEXT_REGSAKPRESERVATIONLABOCOMMON_00949_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>(-Leadership Personnel-)Complex Director: Demetrius Protolab Chief: Eosphor Deuterolab Chief: Redacted
